thread.title: Barbara Evans
thread.title_full: The 3 Week Diet reviewed by Barbara Evans

author: Barbara Evans
title: Barbara Evans
text: First of all I've been hoping, praying, meditating, whatever you want to call it for something like this for a long time. Is this a hidden Hollywood secret? Who knows but it works for a lot of people. Seems it's been around for a long time and Brian breaks it down so even an elementary student can understand how the body works when it comes to loosing weight/burning fat. His book puts everything we thought we knew into prospective and EMPOWERS you. We are also told that hormones kick in at a certain age and there's nothing we can do about it. But there is something we can do about it. When I look around I see so many people who are overweight and suffering and don't know about this. This formula for me thus far is my Holy Grail of loosing weight/fat burning/diet. This is it.
